Description:
GORGEOUS FAMILY HOME
Quietly situated at the end of a cul-de-sac opening onto Ainslie Park, this red-brick family home enjoys a stylish modern design while retaining its traditional charm.
Upon entry, you are welcomed by a modern foyer that operates as an entertaining zone for family and friends, or can be converted into a private lounging quarters, away from the main living area nestled toward the rear.
Further down the hall is the generously sized entertaining area, privately positioned away from the rest of the house. A timber sliding door opens out to a stunning outside deck with canopy views. There is no better place to spend time with your loved ones as you celebrate your new purchase.
Deeper within this deceptively large property is the dual lounge and dining space. Freshly varnished timber floors and clean, white walls adorn each room. The skirtings and architraves betray a humble, yet elegant design found throughout the entire property. Privately positioned through a sliding door, the dining room gives way to a stylish and modern kitchen. Elegant tilework and cabinetry, with their traditional aesthetic balance well against modern appliances, including stainless steel cooktop, dishwasher, oven and grill.
The bedrooms, each coming with built in robes, are generously sized. Large windows flood each room in natural light, drawing out the natural beauty of the polished timber floors. The sleeping quarters, located along the wing of the property, are conveniently situated away from the louder areas of the household.
The main bathroom is a beautiful balance of calming whites and bold blue; gleaming white tiles and soft pastel paint. A large spa sits in the back corner, sided by a towel rail, with the heating vent intelligently placed directly below. A stand-alone shower comes with a water-smart shower head equipped.
This property occupies an almost unrivalled position, sitting adjacent the beautiful Ainslie Park. Only minutes away are the local safes and restaurants of Croydon. Only 700 metres away is the renowned Mullum Mullum Trail. This property is in the Ainslie Parklands Primary School and Melba Secondary College School Zones.

Description:
A Carefree Lifestyle
EXCLUSIVE OFF MARKET OPPORTUNITY.
This wonderful single level brick veneer home with its own street frontage, will provide a carefree lifestyle for those buyers looking for their 1st home, are wanting to downsize, couples, singles, young families or those wanting a solid investment property.
Positioned perfectly in a highly sought after location of Croydon, known as the Monastery area, the home offers you a floor plan that consists of 2 good sized robed bedrooms, the main at the front takes in views to the gardens and access to the bathroom, creating an ensuite effect.
The 2 living areas flow from the formal entry, starting with the spacious lounge room for your everyday living needs, whilst the dining room will look after your dining requirements, whether it be for everyday meals or special occasions like Christmas or birthdays.
There is versatility in the meals area next to the kitchen, that you may choose to use as an extra sitting room.
The centrally located kitchen is well equipped to ensure the avid chef of the family can cook up a storm for any meal occasion.
Before we move outside, we mustn't forget other internal features which include gas ducted heating, split system air conditioning, main bathroom with separate toilet, large laundry room, carpeted through out and light filled interiors with soft subtle colours and tones.
You can entertain outside on the undercover balcony or the paved courtyard which will be perfect for family gatherings, casual BBQ's, alfresco dining, cool afternoon drinks or leisurely weekend breakfasts with a coffee and the paper.
The low maintenance gardens are well established with beautiful rose bushes and other fragrant plants for the garden of the family to enjoy.
Car accommodation is well taken care of in the over sized single garage that has a remote controlled door and through access to the yard. There is also off street parking in the drive for an extra car or visitors.
All this is within a close distance to respected schools, Croydon central with Coles and Aldi supermarkets, cafes, restaurants, public transport, walking tracks, parkland's, playgrounds, easy access to Maroondah highway to get you to Eastland and Eastlink plus all other facilities you may need.
Your carefree lifestyle awaits, so be quick and inquire on viewing times.

Modern living in a private and picturesque position.
Occupying a private and peaceful position in a picturesque modern complex, this impressive town home, set well back from the street, manages to combine bright open living zones with contemporary tones across a magnificent double storey floorplan.
